attributes.action: refrain from supporting the English cricket team. We wish the English cricket team to win the Ashes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has long been established that endorsement from the prime Minister is counterproductive for sports teams, we want the English team to win the Ashes.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
